Articles.Content: For PS4, how to you delete parts in the VAB? Instruction to tell me how to flip things, add things, but nothing how to remove or trash a part. Can someone enlighten me how to do this?
I had to figure it out too. Just take the part or parts back to the selector and drop it. Doesn't mater if it is the same part or not. The parts tab acts as a trash bin

48 minutes ago, KonsoleMinimalist said:

I had to figure it out too. Just take the part or parts back to the selector and drop it. Doesn't mater if it is the same part or not. The parts tab acts as a trash bin

That works for all the control presets. In some of the presets you can press Circle/B to delete the part.

On January 16, 2018 at 5:02 PM, KonsoleMinimalist said:

I had to figure it out too. Just take the part or parts back to the selector and drop it. Doesn't mater if it is the same part or not. The parts tab acts as a trash bin

Now if only I could figure out how to grab a part, every time I try I place a new part. Pressing tool move when i have a new part selected does not help, and I can't get the cursor on the screen without buying a part to place.
